entry.title: Welcome to My Website!
entry.content:
Welcome to my website! I use this space to share my research, projects, and thoughts on economics, machine learning, and academia.

Currently, I am a PhD student in Economics at Simon Fraser University (SFU). My research interests include econometrics, and macroeconomic theory.

A Few Things About Me

  • 📚 Passionate about macroeconomics, econometrics, and applied research.
  • 📊 Experienced in R, Python, Stata, and MATLAB for economic modeling.
  • 🎨 I enjoy painting and exploring art in my free time.
  • 🏋️‍♂️ Trying to integrate gym time into my schedule!

One of my favorite quotes that resonates with me:

“The best way to predict the future is to create it.”

—Peter Drucker

Thanks for visiting my site! Stay tuned for more content.

Best,

Niloufar
